title: Say hello to Exemplar Pro
content:
Submitted by [Goran Soderstrom](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828171010/http:/typophile.com/user/11526 "View user profile.") : 14.Jun.2008 3.28am 

Dear Typophile,

You may or may not know that I’ve been working on a typeface family called Exemplar for the past years but today I’m happy to tell you that this typeface family is released and available via the website of PSY/OPS in San Fransisco. Totally eight weights with a lot of OT-features.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828171010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/exemplarpro_5810.jpg)

This project has been very dear to me and it feels like giving up a child or something now when it’s finally released.

I’ve prepared a PDF specimen that shows the family and its OpenType features together with some other information.

Exemplar Pro, english version:  
 [http://www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro\_Specimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828171010/http:/www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro_Specimen.pdf "http://www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro\_Specimen.pdf")

Exemplar Pro, swedish version:  
 [http://www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro\_Stilprov.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828171010/http:/www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro_Stilprov.pdf "http://www.autodidakt.se/pdf/ExemplarPro\_Stilprov.pdf")

Direct link to distributor:  
 [http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_exemplar.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828171010/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_exemplar.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_exemplar.html")

Kind Regards – all the way from Sweden  
Göran Söderström
author: Goran Soderstrom
